```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(plotly); library(tidyverse)
```

## Histogram of price by diamond cut

```{r, comment=FALSE, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.align='center'}
p <- ggplot(diamonds, aes(x=price, color=cut))+
  geom_freqpoly(binwidth=500)+
  xlab("Price of Diamonds")+
  ylab("Count of Diamonds")

ggplotly(p)

```
